mapper.select: SELECT cr.chat_id AS chatId, cr.created_at AS createdAt FROM chat cr JOIN user_chat uc ON cr.chat_id = uc.chat_id WHERE uc.user_id = #{userId} AND uc.is_deleted = 'N' ORDER BY cr.created_at DESC
SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.name AS name FROM user_chat uc JOIN user u ON uc.user_id = u.user_id WHERE uc.chat_id = #{chatId} AND uc.is_deleted = 'N'
